item.description:
Here's what the Congress has in store for you:

** 3 nights of thrilling salsa dance shows, followed by social dancing with LIVE MUSIC and DJ's till 3:30am!

**2 full days of workshops in salsa and other latin dance styles by local, national and international instructors (most of whom are world renowned artists).

**Our Saturday early evening Youth Showcase promises to rock the house, as usual!

Go to the following link for more info:

http://www.bostonsals...

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Salsa Congress
